title: Why no December OTA for Pixel 4XL?
content:
Unlocked Pixel 4XL purchased from Google Store. AT&T Sim. Repeatedly shows as up-to-date with November 5 patch (which I sideloaded after waiting ten days). The December update was released twelve days ago. It was noted Dec 2 that the 4XL would update "next week". 

Is sideloading now the only way to keep the latest phone updated? Are other 4XL owners still waiting?
